info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 3:51PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Deer Lodge, east central Granite and south central Powell Counties through 430 PM MDT... At 351 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of West Valley, or 9 miles northwest of Anaconda, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Deer Lodge, Anaconda, West Valley, Galen, Lost Creek, Racetrack and Georgetown. This includes Interstate 90 between mile markers 191 and 197. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
